`python --version`

Thank you. I used to use Python 3 on Spyder. I am afraid that the problem is caused by conflicting presence of Python 3 and Python 2. This issue disappeared as I uninstall everything and currently it works with Anaconda Python 3.5.1 :: Anaconda 2.5.0 (64-bit).
